Up.Statement:
IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_Order' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'delivery_tran_id') ALTER TABLE [w2_Order] ADD [delivery_tran_id] [nvarchar] (100) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''); GO
IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_Order' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'online_payment_status') ALTER TABLE [w2_Order] ADD [online_payment_status] [nvarchar] (2) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''); GO
IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_Order' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'online_delivery_status') ALTER TABLE [w2_Order] ADD [online_delivery_status] [nvarchar] (100) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''); GO
IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_OrderShipping' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'shipping_receiving_store_type') ALTER TABLE [w2_OrderShipping] ADD [shipping_receiving_store_type] [nvarchar] (5) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''); GO
IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_FixedPurchaseShipping' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'shipping_receiving_store_type') ALTER TABLE [w2_FixedPurchaseShipping] ADD [shipping_receiving_store_type] [nvarchar] (5) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''); GO
IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_UserShipping' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'shipping_receiving_store_type') ALTER TABLE [w2_UserShipping] ADD [shipping_receiving_store_type] [nvarchar] (5) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''); GO
IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_WorkUserShipping' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'shipping_receiving_store_type') ALTER TABLE [w2_WorkUserShipping] ADD [shipping_receiving_store_type] [nvarchar] (5) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''); GO
IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_OrderWorkflowSetting' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'tw_external_order_info_action') ALTER TABLE [w2_OrderWorkflowSetting] ADD [tw_external_order_info_action] [nvarchar] (2) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''); GO
IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_OrderWorkflowSetting' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'tw_cassette_external_order_info_action') ALTER TABLE [w2_OrderWorkflowSetting] ADD [tw_cassette_external_order_info_action] [nvarchar] (max) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''); GO
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM [w2_MailTemplate] WHERE [shop_id] = '0' AND [mail_id] = '10000092') BEGIN INSERT INTO [dbo].[w2_MailTemplate] ([shop_id] ,[mail_id] ,[mail_name] ,[mail_from] ,[mail_to] ,[mail_cc] ,[mail_bcc] ,[mail_subject] ,[mail_body] ,[mail_subject_mobile] ,[mail_body_mobile] ,[del_flg] ,[date_created] ,[date_changed] ,[last_changed] ,[mail_from_name] ,[mail_category] ,[auto_send_flg] ,[language_code] ,[language_locale_id] ,[sms_use_flg]) VALUES( '0' ,'10000092' ,'ECPay受注情報連携【管理者向け】' ,'pkg_mail@w2solution.co.jp' ,'pkg_mail@w2solution.co.jp' ,'' ,'' ,'ECPay受注情報連携' ,'処理結果： @@ message @@' ,'' ,'' ,'0' ,GETDATE() ,GETDATE() ,'ｗ２ユーザー' ,'' ,'' ,'1' ,'' ,'' ,'0') END GO
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM [w2_MailTemplate] WHERE [shop_id] = '0' AND [mail_id] = '10000093') BEGIN INSERT INTO [dbo].[w2_MailTemplate] ([shop_id] ,[mail_id] ,[mail_name] ,[mail_from] ,[mail_to] ,[mail_cc] ,[mail_bcc] ,[mail_subject] ,[mail_body] ,[mail_subject_mobile] ,[mail_body_mobile] ,[del_flg] ,[date_created] ,[date_changed] ,[last_changed] ,[mail_from_name] ,[mail_category] ,[auto_send_flg] ,[language_code] ,[language_locale_id] ,[sms_use_flg]) VALUES( '0' ,'10000093' ,'コンビニ変更通知【管理者向け】' ,'pkg_mail@w2solution.co.jp' ,'pkg_mail@w2solution.co.jp' ,'' ,'' ,'コンビニ変更通知' ,'処理結果： @@ message @@' ,'' ,'' ,'0' ,GETDATE() ,GETDATE() ,'ｗ２ユーザー' ,'' ,'' ,'1' ,'' ,'' ,'0') END GO
